name: Mascarade (Clawstark, Dimitrouille, Arklan)
description:
Mascarade is a 3D action platformer game made during Global Gamejam 2022 in 48h.

Your goal is to use both light and dark powers to defeat and evil foe who launched "The Mascarade" open the world. 

"Sometimes to overcome fate, you have to accept the darkness within your heart."

Controls :

Move : ZQSD

Right Click : Dark power

Left Click : Light power

Spacebar: Jump/DoubleJump/WallJump

Interaction : X

Crédits :

Dimitri Cochez : Programmer 

Bryan Bargoin : VFX/Sound Design

Thomas Houng-on-seing : 3D Artist
